text:
Need some help. I’m putting together a content strategy for an Arabic-based startup client of mine.

They’re essentially a two-sided platform that connects mid-sized companies with pro freelance writers.


If you were to lead content marketing at such startup, What would you focus on in your first 50-70 days to bring as many leads as you can?
